body: {"previous_messages":[{"text":"Hey mate, how you been?\\nI was hoping we could catch up but this pandemic never seems to end😞\\n\\nI was wondering, in your opinion, is it worth learning php?\\n\\nI’m leaning more towards Node.js, since I’ve been learning React and JavaScript but it’s a deeper learning curve.\\n\\nI’m thinking if I learn php and Wordpress ( I know the basics) it might be easier to setup an e-commerce site , using plugins and themes, than going through Node.js","author":"Sean Emami"},{"text":"Sorry about the massive message 😆","author":"Sean Emami"},{"text":"Hey Sean, good to hear from you.  Hope you're enjoying lockdown 😜\\n\\nPHP has become less popular over the last few years, but there are still a lot of jobs out there.  E.g. Facebook is built with PHP.\\n\\nNode is more popular, and I think you would be better off sticking with that (if you want).  \\n\\nWordPress allows you to build a rich website full of features with virtually zero coding.  I have a WordPress site and I've never written PHP before.  If your goal is to set up a small-medium scale Ecommerce website, then I would definitely stick with WordPress.","author":"Me"},{"text":"Hey Lachie, I’m over the lockdown. I hope next year things get back to normal 😔\\n\\nThanks for your feedback!🌟\\n\\nI have come to the same conclusion. \\nI might just stick to Wordpress with what I have, and avoid php, which is simple enough to learn but I just don’t have enough time..and play with node.js for my own amusement 😆","author":"Sean Emami"},{"text":"I think setting up a an e-commerce website with Node would be 10x harder and take 10x longer than just using WordPress 😂\\n\\nDo you already have a WordPress website?  If so, which webhosting provider are you using?","author":"Me"},{"text":"Yes I think so too 😂\\n\\nYes I do. I have two with the same webhosting, Bluehost. They are not live yet.\\n\\nI just don’t know how the backend database will work without  any php.\\nUnless plugins like woocommerce do the job..??..","author":"Sean Emami"}],"gpt3_params":{"randomness":0.7,"num_results":3,"max_length":50}}
